Class RetrieveRequirementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.controller.requirement.RetrieveRequirementController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class RetrieveRequirementController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This controller coordinates retrieving all of the requirements from the server.
    Author:
    tianchanggu

      • receivedRequirements

        public void receivedRequirements(Requirement[] requirements)
        Add the given requirements to the local model (they were received from the core). This method is called by the RetrieveRequirementsRequestObserver
        Parameters:
        requirements - array of requirements received from the server
